Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Hotel Pacoche Murcia places you in the heart of Murcia, walking distance from Murcia City Hall and Plaza Cardenal Belluga. This hotel is within close proximity of Murcia Cathedral and Ramon Gaya Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 72 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature bathtubs or showers, complimentary toiletries, and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and blackout drapes/curtains.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. This hotel has 2 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 1:00 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

A stay at Hotel Pacoche Murcia places you in the heart of Murcia, walking distance from Murcia City Hall and Plaza Cardenal Belluga. This hotel is within close proximity of Murcia Cathedral and Ramon Gaya Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Murcia City Hall - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Plaza Cardenal Belluga - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Murcia Cathedral - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Ramon Gaya Museum - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Plaza de Santa Isabel - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Romea Theater - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Palacio de San Esteban - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Murcia Bull Ring - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Salzillo Museum - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
University of Murcia-La Merced Campus - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Estadio de La Condomina - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
University of Murcia - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Estadio Nueva Condomina - 7 km / 4.3 mi
Salt Marshes of San Pedro del Pinatar Regional Park - 36.9 km / 22.9 mi
Archaelogical Museum - 42.4 km / 26.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Pacoche Murcia is Murcia (MJV-San Javier) - 35.7 km / 22.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
